post.body: sounds like 2 much time thinking!!! Just speak whatever is on your mind at any given time! Ur naturally smarter than most!!
What's the job opportunity?? That's great!!!
anything Obama does or doesn't say at this point will offend one side or the other. Ill. should go ahead w/ the vote.
it may be in bad taste, but not out of bounds, and this from a Woman!
I personally would like to throw my neice's dirty diaper at Bush, if I had good enough aim, cuz he STINKS!!
Bush just needs to be thankful it was just shoes, and not bullets
the shoe-thorower should be given pitching lessons, so next time he'll hit Bush in the head!!
would've been nice for him to actually give us his story, other than the "truth" on his side! Prove it!!
if Blago is deemed "unfit' b/c of his scandal, how many other politicians will come to face the same charge??
Why does anyone care HOW Obama is sworn in?? He's our Presidenet regardless!!! Get over it already!!!
I have concluded that I have become a solitary worker, and therefore my boss needs to leave my office, NOW!
not looking forward to having to drive home in rush hour traffic in ATL on a rainy day. The accidents started two hrs ago...
under tornado watch, and I'm on the top floor of my building, already being shook by the thunder's mean rumble!!
Will the reluctant GOP allow Obama to prevent us from acting out like Greece?
the problem w/ small political circles is that no matter who you work close with, you will always be connected to some sort of scandal.
Is Obama's presidency just going to be full of both sides crying about what he's NOT doing instead of what he IS doing right?
I'm so excited about seeing my bro n bad lil neice that I just can't concentrate on getting my small work load done today!
MY SOLDIER IS HOME!!!! I can't wait to hug my lil bro!!!!!
how great would it be if Obama appointed Bill Maher, John Stewart, and Steven Colbert to his cabinet!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (One can dream!)
if it wasn't for fear of being likened to Palin, I think I would really start an ATLANTA SECESSION Party!!!! LOL!!!, but 4-real...
did anyone else hear Ricky Smiley's "Diss Letter" to GWB??? LOVED IT!!! And I HATE GWB, too!!!!!!!!!
GA SUCKS!!! Why in the hell did they (I VOTED FOR JIM!!) vote that rotten bastard Saxby AGAIN!!!!
going to rally for Jim Martin!!! Bringing CHANGE to GA!!!!
snowing, but not sticking. maybe it's practice for my white christmas?!?!?!?!?
IT'S SNOWING!! IT'S SNOWING IN THE ATL!!! YAY!!!!!!
I look extremely high, but I swear I'm just sleep-deprived!! Why do Mondays start so freakin early???
Going to have Christmas w/ my Bro b4 he goes home to base in CO (better than going back to Iraq!!)
(feels like Global cooling int ATL, though!! Maybe I'll get that White Christmas I've been waiting 20+ years for!!)
why is it warmer in DC than ATL in Dec?? Global warming, maybe?
it's no secret that I have zero respect for GWB; never have, never will; never voted for him; releived he's finally leaving.
Mexicans are returning to Mexico, w/o plans to come back b/c economy is so bad. We keep getting worse and not any better...
why can't those of us lacking financial security have a bank that will PROTECT our little funds instead of sticking us w/ fees we don't have
I sure wish the "shoe-thrower" would've had better aim!!!! LOL!!
Cold enough for a White Xmas, but 3 days too soon. By then it's gonna be back up to 70. I feel a flu comin on....
yes, I'm still very much cynical when it comes to the skewed definition of "JUSTICE" in this country
well, it's terrible @ lil Cayle. But I'm sure her liar mom will get what she desreves n more (n this is not trust in the judical system!)
I missed his name (thanks, Brandsmart!), but who is this extremely excited guy speaking (shouting) on behalf of Blago?
I thought for sure Blago was goint to have more to say...
waiting to hear what Blago wil say.....nobody plays the waiting game better than politicians!!
Midwest & NE are being frozen, literally, while in the South we are sweating. WTF is going on w/ the weather??
The best Christams gift this year is my Bro being home from Iraq, & staying home through xmas day b4 going back to CO!!!!!
dreams of a White Christmas crushed AGAIN, and a gross cold to compliment it. Not feeling like Christmas any more. :-(
freakin GA weather has gone crazy agian!! nearly 70 in the middle of December!!!
